Description: Pair of feet from a hollow-cast copper alloy figure; tang below right foot; each foot separate; left foot in two pieces.
Curator's comments: See PM viii, p. 747. Identified as the feet to EA 22784 (1889,0209.1).
Bibliographic references: McArthur et al 2015 / The conservation and technical investigation of a hollow-cast Egyptian bronze (p.111)
